name: H2O: A Diabolic Game
summary: H2O is an old dos game, published in 1996 by Webfoot Technologies. Main genre of this old game is puzzle. We gave this game stunning rating of 88 and you can download it for free right here. Water, or in other words, H2O is very much sophisticated puzzle game where your task is to get as much water into the bowl, or other pre-designated location. It won't be as easy of course, you guide pixel-sized droplets of liquid to an exit and in the way there are a lot of obstacles. Whether accomplish the task level depends on how many drops you manage to get to the destination. The concept of this game is similar to Lemmings. Each level has its own password, which only shows up when you finish the level.
